content.body: hmm, I agree that it's a bug worth fixing in the runtimes, but I think it's a stretch to think there are security implications and really have no idea what the connection to tc39 would be
no connection to tc39, just that this is a place i can get ahold of v8 people :-)
I can ask Erik Correy or Dan Carney to take a look. Both are v8 people here at CF who have worked with encodings in the engine.
